Instance Method Details

# (void) swapShaderType(shaderType)

# (void) _handleCodeMirrorLint(value, callback, options, cm) Bound Private

Handle CodeMirror lint events. These are fired a few hundred milliseconds after the user has finished typing in an editor window, and we use them to update the shader source

# (void) _handleShanderChange(shaderType) Bound Private

Update the UI when the shader is changed form the model

# (void) _handleShaderErrorsChange(shaderType) Bound

# (void) _addLineWrapIndent(cm, line, elt) Bound Private

indent wrapped lines. Based on http://codemirror.net/demo/indentwrap.html but this version indents the wrapped line by a further 2 characters
